mapper.select: select idx, title, content, to_char(w_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as w_date, nickname, b.b_code, t.b_name, label, u_idx from board_${url} b join board_type_${url} t on b.b_code = t.b_code where title = #{title} and u_idx = #{u_idx} and content = #{content} and label = #{label}

SELECT * FROM board_momoco a left outer JOIN doc_storage_momoco b ON a.idx = b.idx left outer JOIN common_board_momoco c ON a.idx = c.idx left outer JOIN board_status_momoco d ON a.idx = d.idx left outer JOIN calendar_momoco e ON e.idx = a.idx left outer JOIN kanban_momoco f ON f.idx = d.idx left outer join label g on a.label = g.label left outer JOIN member h on a.u_idx =h.u_idx order by a.idx desc

SELECT * FROM board_${url} a left outer JOIN doc_storage_${url} b ON a.idx = b.idx left outer JOIN common_board_${url} c ON a.idx = c.idx left outer JOIN board_status_${url} d ON a.idx = d.idx left outer JOIN calendar_${url} e ON e.idx = a.idx left outer JOIN kanban_${url} f ON f.idx = d.idx
WHERE a.title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR a.content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY a.idx DESC
